channel.title: Adding object teleports [Dementhium]
channel.description: how do i add object teleports? like clicking a door and teleporting you somewhere. i have been looking everywhere.. any advice helps

item.title: Adding object teleports [Dementhium]
item.dc:creator: @PriMaL_PvP PriMaL_PvP
item.description:

Before you try to insult someone make sure you learn to spell.
I didn’t see [Dementhium]
[/quote]
Oh Im Sorry I Misspelled What I Think Of You
Idiot Okay? Typo. And It Says Dementhium In The Title

Dementhium[/quote]

item.title: Adding object teleports [Dementhium]
item.dc:creator: @iownmyscape iownmyscape
item.description:
@iownmyscape wrote:

[quote=“PriMaL_PvP, post:3, topic:428910”]Are You an Idot?

He Asked For Dementhium…
Not Delta…

Look For ObjectPacketHandler.
Search For [quote]switch (gameObject.getId()) {[/quote]

case (Object Id): player.animate(2140); player.teleport(X, Y, H); break;

[X] - X Coords
[Y] - Y Coords
[H] - Height Level[/quote]
thanks man!

Read full topic

item.title: Adding object teleports [Dementhium]
item.dc:creator: @axecutor9090 axecutor9090
item.description:
@axecutor9090 wrote:

Delta 317

if(objectID == ####){
toX = ####;
toY = ####;
}

And/Or

if(objectID == #### && absX == #### && absY == ####){
toX = ####;
toY = ####;
}

Read full topic
